name: TACO TUESDAY
description:
READ THIS BEFORE YOU PLAY:

For some reason the multiplier upgrade is glitched, the price of it does not show for the first upgrade. Just know, it costs $100 to upgrade it for the first multiplier upgrade.

Prequel: https://sirstupidity.itch.io/taco-game

You play as Charlie Collins, Johnathans brother.

Johnathan has started a taco restaurant and is doing really well. So you decide to try a taco restaurant yourself. Plus.. you havent been paying your taxes and the IRS is still searching for you. It will take them around 3 days to find you... Nows your chance! Make some money!
